name: fox
trans: 狐狸。A carnivorous mammal with a bushy tail and reddish fur.

name: fast
trans: 快的。Moving or capable of moving at high speed.

name: busy
trans: 忙碌的。Actively engaged in work or occupied.

name: proud
trans: 骄傲的。Feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction from achievements.

name: fierce
trans: 凶猛的。Having or displaying intense aggressiveness.

name: animals
trans: 动物。Living organisms that feed on organic matter.

name: monkey
trans: 猴子。A small to medium-sized primate with a tail.

name: popped
trans: 突然弹出。Suddenly burst or appeared.

name: cheetah
trans: 猎豹。A large spotted cat known for its speed.
